1370: Ghodscalc was born in Kerckstraet in 1370.
Got married to Helyana at age 21 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Helyana, Lelien, at age 21.
Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 1 years old.
1371: Lost son Herman when Herman was 0 years old.
Helyana gave birth to their stillborn son Herman in 1371.
1374: Had a son with Helyana, Ghoris, at age 25.
1375: Had a daughter with Helyana, Godeweris, at age 26.
1376: Had a daughter with Helyana, Mette, at age 27.
1384: Had a daughter with Helyana, Esa, at age 35.
1388: Had a daughter with Helyana, Hilduardis, at age 39.
